and system administration with major telecom organizations presently associate with jaiprakash associates limited (jaypee group), as consultant central data centre implemented iso 27001:2005 standards and compliance a keen planner with abilities in managing it & information security networking operations with focus on profitability and achieving company's mission & strategic direction. adept in corporate communication
